attributes.action: ensure that the speaker of the house of commons steps down immediately.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister as the head of government should see to it that the speaker resigns immediately as confidence in him has been destroyed.

rejection.details: Speaker Michael Martin announced on May 19 he will step down in June.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
